definitions.definition: One who, or that which, raps or knocks.

subdefinitions.definition: A swinging knocker for making signals at the mouth of a shaft .
A spiritualistic medium who claims to receive communications from spirits in the form of knocking sounds.

definitions.definition: A performer of rap music , or someone who raps in any form of music.
examples: He rose from the ghetto to become a successful rapper .

definitions.definition: A flexible strip of metal, 45-60cm long, with handles at each end, used for Northumbrian rapper sword dancing .

A mechanical, or later electric, signalling device formerly used in the mines of north-eastern England to signal to the engineman that the cages carrying men or coals up and down the shaft were ready to be raised or lowered.

main_definition: One who, or that which, raps or knocks.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A performer of rap music , or someone who raps in any form of music.
A flexible strip of metal, 45-60cm long, with handles at each end, used for Northumbrian rapper sword dancing .

A mechanical, or later electric, signalling device formerly used in the mines of north-eastern England to signal to the engineman that the cages carrying men or coals up and down the shaft were ready to be raised or lowered.
( colloquial , dated ) A bold lie ; a whopper .
